description: This file defines a React functional component called 'Arc' that renders an animated elliptical arc using SVG. It utilizes hooks and external libraries such as React's useState and Remotion's useVideoConfig and random. The component dynamically creates a gradient fill and calculates the stroke dasharray for animation based on the provided progress.

methods.name: getCircumferenceOfArc
methods.description: Calculates the circumference of an ellipse for a given rx and ry, used to define the stroke dash array for the SVG ellipse.
